name: Maintainability Rating
description: Assesses the maintainability of the project based on the Technical Debt Ratio, indicating the effort required to fix code issues.

ranks.description: Excellent: Very low technical debt (≤5% of the project's development time)
Good: Low technical debt (6-10% of the project's development time)
Fair: Moderate technical debt (11-20% of the project's development time)
Poor: High technical debt (21-50% of the project's development time)
Very Poor: Very high technical debt (>50% of the project's development time)

name: Reliability Rating
description: Evaluates the reliability of the project by assessing the severity and quantity of bug issues present.

ranks.description: 0 Bugs: No bug issues detected. Excellent reliability.
Minor Bugs: At least 1 minor bug present. Good reliability.
Major Bugs: At least 1 major bug present. Fair reliability.
Critical Bugs: At least 1 critical bug present. Poor reliability.
Blocker Bugs: At least 1 blocker bug present. Very Poor reliability.

name: Vulnerabilities Rating
description: Measures the project's security posture by evaluating the number and severity of security vulnerabilities detected.

ranks.description: 0 Vulnerabilities: No security vulnerabilities detected. Excellent security posture.
Minor Vulnerabilities: At least 1 minor vulnerability present. Good security posture.
Major Vulnerabilities: At least 1 major vulnerability present. Fair security posture.
Critical Vulnerabilities: At least 1 critical vulnerability present. Poor security posture.
Blocker Vulnerabilities: At least 1 blocker vulnerability present. Very Poor security posture.

name: Security Hotspots Rating
description: Evaluates the thoroughness of the security review process by measuring the percentage of Security Hotspots that have been reviewed.

ranks.description: 80% and above: ≥80% of Security Hotspots reviewed. Outstanding security review.
70% to <80%: ≥70% and <80% of Security Hotspots reviewed. Good security review.
50% to <70%: ≥50% and <70% of Security Hotspots reviewed. Fair security review.
30% to <50%: ≥30% and <50% of Security Hotspots reviewed. Poor security review.
<30%: Less than 30% of Security Hotspots reviewed. Very Poor security review.
